definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Our production of woven side band, high quality, washable, color stability.
sentences.chinese: 我司生產的織邊帶，品質高，耐水洗，顏色穩定。

sentences.english: But it is no obvious improvement in water resistance of water-borne polyurethane.
sentences.chinese: 但單純的水性聚氨酯的耐水性還不夠理想。

sentences.english: For situations where extreme water resistance is required, epoxy is the best choice.
sentences.chinese: 在需要極端耐水的情況下，環氧樹脂是最好的選擇。

sentences.english: In this paper, the manufacturing processes of washable upper leather has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究耐水洗鞋面革的加工過程。

sentences.english: Sycamore occurs north America that adapts different environments, especially wetland.
sentences.chinese: 美國梧桐廣泛分佈於北美，適應性廣，尤其耐水溼。

sentences.english: Good heat and water resisting, suitable for common continuous twine products.
sentences.chinese: 耐熱耐水性好，適用於普通連續纏繞製品。

sentences.english: The key to the development of magnesite is to improve its water resistance.
sentences.chinese: 指出菱鎂發展的關鍵是改變相組分提高耐水性。

sentences.english: The riparian plant's waterlogging resistance had a relation with cultivation skill.
sentences.chinese: 濱水植物耐水溼能力與栽培技術有關。

sentences.english: This paper introduces synthesis technology of water resistant gel coat resin.
sentences.chinese: 本文對耐水型膠衣樹脂的合成工藝和性能作了介紹。

sentences.english: It is used to testing the washing color fastness for all kinds of color textile.
sentences.chinese: 主要用於檢測各類有色織物的耐水洗色牢度。

sentences.english: Water, wash color fastness and rubbing degree of fixation better than soda.
sentences.chinese: 耐水，洗色，牢度及耐摩擦度都比純鹼固色優勝。

sentences.english: Does not bear wet, envies the water.
This paper mainly deals with the water-fastness of fabrics coated with fluorocarbon.
sentences.chinese: 主要研究氟碳類化合物塗層織物的耐水洗性能問題。

sentences.english: The waterproof material is suitable for the aerial used near the waterfall.
sentences.chinese: 這種耐水材料適合用在瀑步附近的天線。
